Title: Clean UI
Description: Fork focuses on a easy-to-understand and robust user interface for new and experienced users alike.

Title: Free
Description:
No need to whip up your credit card.
But if you like the project and want to improve it help us cover the costs.

Title: Open Source
Description:
Missing a feature?
Source Code for this project is publicly available so come by and add your code.

Title: Up To Date
Description:
Fork is always up to date with the newest Minecraft, Paper, etc. releases
Let's explore those caves together!

Title: Multiple Servers
Description: Run multiple Minecraft servers at once and combine them into a single network using Waterfall and play with ALL your friends.

Title: Plugins
Description: Full support for Paper and we also have a fancy manager for your plugins. Never spend hours to find this one plugin anymore.

Title: Windows
Description:
Fork can only run on Windows but we're also working on solutions to bring Fork to
Mac and Linux

Title: Fast Support
Description:
Couldn't run your fancy server?
Hop on our Discord Server and we'll
help you out.
